BNSF 1262 DELAYED
BNSF 1262, the 3:16 pm arrival to Chicago, maybe operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to positive train control issues

Kenosha Elevator Out of Service
The Kenosha elevator is out of service. Customers can use Winthrop Harbor or Zion as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPNW #652 Delayed 35-40 Minutes
Inbound train #652 scheduled to arrive Ogilvie Transportation Center at 3:10 P.M. is on the move and operating 35-40 minutes behind schedule due to police activity and track construction.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 7 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert - Metra Electric District Extra Service For Chicago Bears Games
The Metra Electric District will run extra train service for anticipation of larger than normal crowds for the Chicago Bears home games. For more information click here and visit metra.com.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N - Weekend track construction through January 16, 2024

Track construction will be taking place every weekend at the Grayland station, Rondout, and the Everett crosssing  through January 16, 2024. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone on Saturday and Sunday until the work is complete. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - University Park station stairway out of service. Customers must use the ramp until further notice.
The stairway at the University Park station is out of service. Customers must use the ramp until further notice. Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert SWS - Oak Lawn Platform Rehabilitation

Beginning Saturday, September 9, the north half of Platform 2 (outbound platform) will be closed for rehabilitation. Once completed, the work will move to the south half of Platform 2 to complete the project by the end of November. Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-W -  Geneva Platform 2 Rehabilitation

On Monday, October 9, the Geneva outbound platform (Platform 2) will be closed for rehabilitation through the end of 2024. Commuters must use the temporary platform located east of Third Street.  Please allow additional time to access the in-service platform and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert MD-W -  Wood Dale Platform 1 Rehabilitation

Beginning Wednesday, October 4. the west half of Platform 1 (outbound platform) will be closed for rehabilitation for 1 month. Commuters must use the east pedestrian crosswalk to access the platforms. Once completed, the work will move to the east half of Platform 1 to complete the project by the end of November. Please allow additional time to access the in-service platforms and exercise caution near the work zones.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert RI - 103rd street/Washington Heights station parking lot repaving completed
Starting on October 18th, the parking lot surrounding the depot at the 103rd street/Washington Heights station will be accssibile to customers as the repairs have been completed.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert BNSF - Washington Street Railroad Crossing Closed for Construction

Beginning, Monday, October 9, 2023, the Washington Street railroad crossing will be closed for The Village’s Civic Center construction project.  The crossing is expected to reopen the week of October 23.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Stairway Construction at University Park
Reconstruction of the stairs at the University Park station will begin in early November. Metra anticipates completion of the project by early 2024. Please exercise caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert BNSF - On October 17th, pedestrian access to Washington Street rail crossing in Downers Grove blocked, concrete installation
The Pedestrian access to the Washington Street rail crossing in Downers Grove will be blocked on Tuesday, October 17 for the installation of new concrete. Please use Main Street.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Van Buren Platform 2 South Stairway
The south stairway on platform 2 at Van Buren is out of service. Customers must use the north stairway until further notice.
